name: DemonsStories
description:
this is a start of my undergraduate final project, its not have a history implemented yet and nothing is close to complete. - i will update the game constantly

Im trying to do a game based in a good AI development, so thats first parte is with the basic AI.

Basic FPS controls

need to get 4 computers and go back to the first spot

spawns heals and batterys on the map

can hide in lockers and bathroons 

use battery is R

use heal is Q
